Ohidur's F-Droid Repo

This is an OFFICIAL Ohidur's android apps repository compatible with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohidurbappy/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
9B 0B B9 84 7C C7 B7 D0 E9 EC 6B A1 C7 A0 CA 8C B8 C8 F1 A8 02 B0 5E C4 49 91 90 C3 9A A4 BA AC
